description.value:
You have learned how to create perpetual alchemical infusions that can provide a near-infinite supply of certain simple items.

You gain the ability to create two 1st-level alchemical items using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Quick Alchemy]{Quick Alchemy} without spending a batch of infused reagents. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Antidote (Lesser)]{Lesser Antidote} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Antiplague (Lesser)]{Lesser Antiplague}.
